column5: Well folks its that time of year to go on vacation.  I am going camping with my family in Northern Ontario at Samuel de Champlain Provincial Park near Mattawa ontario (2hrs from Lakair).  We have a site close to the water.The Tent Trailer is packed and ready to go.Bringing the 12 foot tinny I hope to have a nice report when I get back.  I borrowed Greencoachdog's fish finder just in case the fishing is tough  .    I will be back in one week with a full report.Sure gonna miss this website.Leaving Saturday am.  Mike the Pike.
Hey Mike! You'll have a BLAST using that finder!!!... That's my old one, I've got the new and improved C4 model now.  Hope ya have a great time on vacation. We'll be lookin' forward to your report!
Good luck Mike, enjoy your trip! -Brian
Have a great holiday and take lots of pictures...
Im sure you were just Red Flagged for that comment by Homeland Security
lol, nice fishfinder. I joked with my gf that dynamite might come in handy.  I think dynamite is old school. RPG is the way to go.
Have a great time, and we'll be looking forward to the report....and pictures!!  Safe travels.... dk
Good luck, have fun and be safe!! Looking forward to the pics of all the fish your kids catch...and you complaining about being skunked...LOL.
Nothing like stealing away from work with the family for a little R&R.  Have a great time, and take lots of pictures...  Even when your kids outfish you!  Cheers  Jen
Have a great holiday.You better rest up because you are going to need it for when you get back and come out this way for some big lake O muscle.Dan
Have a great time Mike. Hope the fishing is fine for you as well. Drive careful.

Ok guys I will try and out fish the kids.Jus t going to bed now .I was delayed for an hour due to thunder storms.It took a while to strap the 12 foot tinny to my  tent trailer just finished packing.I will take lots of pics.I will be back next week.MTP
Yeah right!  ... and where am I goin' to be from with this accent?... Yemen???

Hey go get em mike.!!!!!!!!!!!!    have a great camping trip,and enjoy a shore lunch or 2,or3,or4....its a very nice park,and yes the fishing is good up there as well,looking forward to your report bud....cheers
